content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_LoadDim_Notification_Outcome]    Script Date: 12/22/2022 5:05:42 AM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_LoadDim_Notification_Outcome]
( @GetNewWaterMark bit=0,@RowValidFrom Datetime2(7)='1900-01-01 00:00:00.0000000'
)
AS
Begin 
	IF @GetNewWaterMark>0
	BEGIN
	SELECT isnull(max(RowValidFrom),@RowValidFrom) AS RowValidFrom
			FROM [dbo].[ws_notificationoutcome]
			WHERE CAST(RowValidFrom As datetime2(7))>@RowValidFrom
	END
	ELSE
WITH CTE AS (
SELECT  
	[ws_notificationoutcomeid] AS	[NotificationOutcomeID]
	,[ws_name] AS					[NotificationOutcome]
	,b.LocalizedLabel AS			[Status]
	,C.LocalizedLabel AS			[StatusReason]
	,[IsDelete]
	,convert(datetimeoffset,[modifiedon]) as	[ModifiedDate]
	,convert(datetimeoffset,[createdon]) as		[CreatedDate]
	,createdbyname as	[CreatedBy]
	,modifiedbyname		[ModifiedBy]
	,ROW_NUMBER()OVER (PARTITION BY [ws_notificationoutcomeid] Order by versionnumber DESC) AS ROW_RUM

FROM [dbo].[ws_notificationoutcome] A
	LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StateMetadata] B
		  ON A.statecode=b.State
		  AND b.EntityName='ws_notificationoutcome'
		  AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
	LEFT JOIN [dbo].StatusMetadata C
		  ON A.statuscode=C.Status
		  AND c.EntityName='ws_notificationoutcome'
		  AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
		  Where [ws_notificationoutcomeid] is not null
		  AND  CAST(a.RowValidFrom as datetime2(7)) > @RowValidFrom)

	SELECT 
	 --Row_NUMBER() Over (order by [NotificationOutcomeID] desc)+1000 AS NotificationOutcomeKey
	 [NotificationOutcome]
	,[NotificationOutcomeID]
	FROM CTE WHERE ROW_RUM=1 
	and status='Active' 
	and NotificationOutcomeID is not null

	UNION 

	SELECT 

	Null,
	'UNKNOWN'
	
	END
GO
